AI Basics for Parents: What You Need to Know

Date & Time
Dec 20, 2025
2:00 PM - 4:00 PM
Location
Newark Public Library, Main Branch
$0
Cost
100% FREE
beginner-FRIENDLY parents
ðŸ“‹

ABOUT THIS EVENT

Learn how AI affects your children's education and daily life. No tech experience needed - just bring your questions!

This workshop is designed specifically for parents who want to understand AI technology and how it affects their children. We will cover the basics of artificial intelligence in plain language, discuss real-world AI applications your kids encounter daily, and provide practical strategies for having meaningful conversations about AI at home.

Learn how AI is used in apps, games, and educational tools. Understand the privacy implications and how to guide your children in using AI responsibly. This is a judgment-free, beginner-friendly environment where all questions are welcome.
